label: water
caption: A young girl splashes around in the shallow end of a public pool, her eyes shielded behind brightly colored goggles as she plays with her friends on a sunny afternoon. The warm sun beats down on the crowded pool area, casting a vibrant glow over the scene as children laugh and shout around her. Nearby, adults lounge on colorful beach towels, keeping a watchful eye on their little ones as they enjoy their summer break.
